comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: LOC: Bain caption is is Ralph Pulitzer and Wife.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
artolog,

Thanks for the heads up on the mismatch between the two captions provided by Bain. (One comes from the caption cards and one from the negative or negative sleeve - and they often don't agree!)  We will expand the title to add Mr. Pulitzer's wife and more details, such as her name and their location.  Incidentally, this should be his first wife, Frederica Vanderbilt Webb, as he didn't marry his second wife until 1928 and this photo is earlier.
